SocialPersona.name: SocialPersona
SocialPersona.description: Represents a snapshot of a contact's profile on a social network such as Facebook or Twitter.

AreWeFollowing.description: Specifies whether a Salesforce social account is following the social persona or not.

AuthorLabels.description: Comma-separated list of author type tags.

AvatarUrl.description: Retrieves the user's social network avatar. It's a read-only field and you can't specify or update its value.

ExternalId.description: ID of the social persona on the social network.

ExternalPictureURL.description: URL to the picture of the social persona on the social network.

Followers.description: Number of followers that the social persona has.

Following.description: Number of people that the social persona is following.

InfluencerScore.description: Radian6 score describing the influence of the social persona. No longer used.

IsBlacklisted.description: Specifies whether the social persona is blacklisted or not.

IsDefault.description: Specifies whether the social persona supplies the default avatar image thatâ€™s displayed on the contact or account.

IsFollowingUs.description: Specifies whether the social persona is following a Salesforce social account or not.

IsVerified.description: Specifies whether the social persona is verified or not.

LastReferencedDate.description: Date and time when the social persona was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: Date and time when the social persona was last viewed.

MediaProvider.description: Social network of the social persona.

MediaType.description: Social network type of the social persona.

NumberOfFriends.description: Number of friends that the social persona has.

NumberOfTweets.description: Number of tweets made by the social persona.

ParentId.description: ID of the contact parent record for the social persona.

ProfileType.description: Type of profile. Values are: Person Page

Provider.description: Social network, such as Facebook or Twitter, of the social persona.

R6SourceId.description: ID of the social persona in Social Studio.

RealName.description: Real name of the social persona.

SourceApp.description: Salesforce product that created the social persona.

TopicType.description: Type of topic, such as keyword or managed.
